name: Brothers (itch)
description:
Controls:

WASD - move

Left Click - shoot

  Brothers is a game I made for my brother's 23rd birthday. It was a last minute project that I started the day before his birthday, I spent roughly 10 hours on it. 

  You play as my brother and the objective is to collect all 23 candles. When you collect 2 candles (turn 2 years old) I join the game, signifying my birth. You can shoot cake at the dentists if they get too close. Good luck!
